entities.name: merpeople
entities.description: The merpeople are mentioned as breaking the surface of the water to listen. They are described as having a language called Mermish.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as crouching at the water's edge two years ago and conversing in Mermish with the Merchieftainess. He is described as being dead.

entities.name: merchieftainess
entities.description: The Merchieftainess is mentioned as conversing in Mermish with Dumbledore two years ago.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is described as sitting at the water's edge, remembering Dumbledore and feeling sad about his death.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as being present with Harry and the others, but she is not described in detail.

entities.name: centaurs
entities.description: The centaurs are mentioned as coming to pay their respects, but they are not described in detail.

relationships.description: Dumbledore and the Merchieftainess conversed in Mermish two years ago.
Harry remembered Dumbledore crouching at the water's edge and conversing with the Merchieftainess.
